gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Thunder 111, Trail Blazers 109
gameRecap.excerpt: Jalen Williams (19 points) knocks down the game-winning jumper with two seconds remaining in regulation as the Thunder defeat the Trail Blazers, 111-109. Shai Gilgeous-Alexander led the Thunder with 33 points, six rebounds, 10 assists and five steals in the victory, while Scoot Henderson tallied 19 points, four rebounds and seven assists for the Trail Blazers in the losing effort. The Thunder improve to 30-13 on the season, while the Trail Blazers fall to 12-31.
